sentences.en: A trolleybus will take you to the museum .
sentences.cn: 一部无轨电车会带你到博物馆。

sentences.en: But you'll have to change for Trolleybus No. 26 at Huaihai Road.
sentences.cn: 但是你得在淮海路换乘26号无轨电车.

sentences.en: He is a dispatcher at the trolleybus company.
He often goes to school by trolleybus.
sentences.cn: 他经常乘无轨电车上学.

sentences.en: Please tell me where the bus ( trolleybus ) stand is?
sentences.cn: 请告诉我公共汽车 ( 无轨电车 ) 站在 哪里 ?

sentences.en: So many pupils rushed for the trolleybus that I could hardly get off.
sentences.cn: 许多小学生着急地往无轨电车上挤,挤得我几乎都下不了车.

sentences.en: The new trolleybus line was routed through the commercial district.
sentences.cn: 新的无轨电车路线规定要通过商业区。

sentences.en: The trolleybus ahead cannot move because of power failure.
sentences.cn: 前面那辆电车因断电而开不动了.

sentences.en: This Chong car appears at 50 time, use at replacing old bus and trolleybus.
sentences.cn: 这忡汽车出现于50年代, 用于取代旧的公共汽车和无轨电车.
我们是乘无轨电车去的.

sentences.en: When in Pyongyang, Jong Tae-se, a Japanese-born forward who plays for the J-League team Kawasaki Frontale, travels to training by subway and trolleybus .
sentences.cn: 出生于日本、在日本J联赛中效力于川崎前锋队的前锋郑大世，在平壤时乘坐地铁和无轨电车去训练。

sentences.en: When in Pyongyang, Jong Tae-se, a Japanese-born forward who plays for the J-League team Kawasaki Frontale, travels to training by subway and trolleybus.
sentences.cn: 出生于日本、在日本J联赛中效力于川崎前锋队的前锋郑大世，在平壤时乘坐地铁和无轨电车去训练。

sentences.en: You can take a No.105 trolleybus to the Children's Palace.
sentences.cn: 你可以乘105路无轨电车去少年宫.

sentences.en: You need a One - o - seven trolleybus.
You should take a One - o - nine trolleybus.
You'll have to change to the trolleybus next stop.
sentences.cn: 你下一站得改乘无轨电车.

words.tran_cn: 手推车；（美）无轨电车（等于streetear）；（英）有轨电车（等于trolleybus）；空中吊运车

trans.tran_en: a bus that uses power from electric wires above the street
